Adjusting Pension Awards Based on CNH/VA NHCU Admission
Upon admission to a CNH or VA nursing home care unit (NHCU), review the claim and admission details to determine if a reduction to the $90 rate is needed in accordance with
38 CFR 3.551
, and consider authorizing A&A based on qualified nursing home patient status.
Note
:  If a claimant is receiving less than the $90 rate per month for pension, a reduction due to admission to a CNH or VA NHCU does not apply.  Continue the present rate.
